root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 14-4-1, translated into en
root.data:
Data availability

Description:

The indicator has global data from 1974 to 2013. There is not systematic country data available. Regional breakdown by continent is impossible as fish live in the sea. However, it is possible to bread it down to oceans or by FAO statistical regions.

Time series:

From 1974 to 2013

Disaggregation:

Disaggregation by country is not possible for the moment.
